title: SET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS
content:
0xBF25EB89375A37AD0xD4A215BA// SetRelationshipBetweenGroups
void SET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(int relationship, Hash group1, Hash group2);Sets the relationship between two groups. This should be called twice (once for each group).  
Relationship types:  
0 = Companion  
1 = Respect  
2 = Like  
3 = Neutral  
4 = Dislike  
5 = Hate  
255 = Pedestrians  
Example:  
PED::SET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(2, l_1017, 0xA49E591C);  
PED::SET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(2, 0xA49E591C, l_1017);
codeBlocks:
// SetRelationshipBetweenGroups
void SET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(int relationship, Hash group1, Hash group2);

Sets the relationship between two groups. This should be called twice (once for each group).  
Relationship types:  
0 = Companion  
1 = Respect  
2 = Like  
3 = Neutral  
4 = Dislike  
5 = Hate  
255 = Pedestrians  
Example:  
PED::SET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(2, l_1017, 0xA49E591C);  
PED::SET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_GROUPS(2, 0xA49E591C, l_1017);
